reviews.review_msg: Christina is a very nice teacher who conveys information to her students well. Great course structure!
Stephen is a nice man but he seriously has the most boring lectures imaginable and picks the worst material to read for class.

Stephen is kind, hilarious and passionate about literature. His only downside is not using any powerpoint material while teaching. He just talks to the class about the material we've read. So sometimes it's difficult to stay engaged. If you come to class prepared, and try to be engaged, you'll get more out of it. If you zone out, you will get lost.
